basic.blooming: Flowering period in spring, fruiting period in autumn and winter
basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color red

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Resistant to shade, put in the place with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Watering only when soil is dry, water thoroughly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
